snippet: A birdie on the final hole gave Chris Kirk the outright lead in the Sony Open in Honolulu. Kirk’s 65 gave him a one-shot lead over Harris English and Will Wilcox, a PGA Tour rookie.
abstract: Chris Kirk takes third-round lead in the Sony Open in Honolulu; other golf news noted.
lead_paragraph: A birdie on the final hole gave Chris Kirk the outright lead in the Sony Open in Honolulu. Kirk’s 65 gave him a one-shot lead over Harris English and Will Wilcox, a PGA Tour rookie.
